# Secret Technique: Insect Wall

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Hiden~Aburame Clan, Ninjutsu
- Class: Defensive
- Range: Short
- Users: Shino Aburame, Shibi Aburame
- Media: Anime, Game

## Summary
By releasing a large number of kikaichÅ«, the user creates a massive wall out of them, which protects both himself and allies nearby. The wall is strong enough to protect against large falling objects and Fire Release techniques.
